title: The Infrastructure’s Guide - Novel Updates
tags: Farming   Fast Learner   Low-key Protagonist   Mpreg   Power Couple   Seme Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Tribal Society
author: 岛里天下
description:
Meng Sheng transformed into a man with a powerful breath in a prehistoric world where he was dressed in leathers and drank blood.

It is said that the greater the power, the greater the responsibility and burden of leading the tribesmen. The strain of survival soon fell on his shoulders.

Since then;

Holding the bone needle to teach sewing,

Undertaking the task of mining ore and smelting weapons,

Kicking shameless offenders,

Building houses, cages, and sheep pens, and

Domesticating wild animals like poultry, cattle, and sheep

Become Meng Sheng’s daily life…>
